title: Charting A Course
author: vass
summary: From the private notes of Cliopher Mdang on his fanoa's dating prospects.

title: Incandescent as the Sun
author: Witgifu
summary:
“Oh, very good, my lord,” said Cliopher, and unconsciously looked up into the eyes of the Sun-on-Earth. He had known, everyone knew, that the Lord Emperor's gaze could blind. He had broken one of the great taboos.

In canon, the taboo against eye contact was gone. But what if it was only weakened?

title: I have loved you all too long and well
author: Crackfoxx
summary: The blanketing heat fell across the quiet valley like a shroud. The calves lolled listless beneath the trees. Even the crows simmered silently in their roosts, black feathers baked by the merciless sun. The dust of the road puffed beneath the dragging hooves of the roan charger.

title: :lock: When I come back to you, as summer comes
author: Crackfoxx
summary: I packed the basket with care. Tin dishes, cutlery, and cleverly collapsing cups tucked into the inner pocket. A small pot of honey and another of jam nestled into the bottom, wrapped in napkins. Next came the cheese and a spicy sausage Mr. Sifton had just got in. A fresh loaf from Mr. Ingleside's bakery laid on top of that, and placed snugly beside it the honeycake I had made early that morning. Thank the Lady the heat had broken or I would have resorted to buying the cake as well.

title: Love and happiness for Melissa
author: Byotek
summary:
3 short stories showing Melissa’s love life through different types of love and relationships. (While not being a major downer, which is tricky because Melissa really gets the short end of the stick in cannon.)

Mellisa and lady Jivane- post fall
Mellisa’s first crush- age 16
Found family- HOTE era ish

title: learning to sing
author: celebros
summary: That morning, when Melissa sees him from across the garden, her breath comes in sharply. If there had been any doubt, his appearance makes it abundantly clear who he is.

title: gilded grace
author: lux_arcana
summary:
Cliopher isn't jealous, really. Ludvic had gained the marks by saving Fitzroy's life; it would be strange to be jealous of such a terrifying thing, an event he still had nightmares about.

He just - thinks they are beautiful. And attractive, in a way. And he can't stop himself from staring at them. But it's not like he could say anything...

Fitzroy has another idea.

(Retirement-era smudgies for SunInGlory)

title: Velioi Dances
author: quondame
summary: Navalia plans her adventures carefully.

title: dancing in the caves
author: sisina6
summary: It would be easier, I’d thought, down in the deep caves of my heart, where I couldn’t see what I couldn’t have. It didn’t work; he came after me anyway.

title: Tahuna Cove
author: RoundedLoaf
summary: In a rare break in the Gorjo City Opera House’s lead soprano’s busy schedule, Eidora Mdang takes her husband and children for a holiday on the far side of Loaloa. Her favourite sister, Oura, tags along.

title: This giving up is not a repenting
author: Crackfoxx
summary: The patient masseuse gently rubbed warm oil into Eidora's wrinkled hands. She was getting better at ignoring the voice in her head that insisted she should be doing something more important with her day. Much harder to ignore, was the voice that idly wondered what was happening to the family in her absence.

title: The Roses of Katharmoon
author: alfgifu
summary:
The Red Company are on the run, seeking a safe route out of Ysthar, and Pali Avramapul is glad for the company of her first and best friend.

Fitzroy is also there.

title: Love Beyond Definition
author: justjourneys
summary: A quiet morning full of reflections on love and relationships in the household post retirement.

title: flexible working hours
author: Nemainofthewater
summary: There was a light in the offices.

title: Home, Away
author: bookwyrm
summary: Sailing on the ocean is a far cry from paddling around the millpond.

title: Almost Know You
author: songofsunset
summary: After a morning spent in Ikialo Village, Kip and his lord run into someone unexpected on the forest path.

title: Call, Respond, Course-Correct
author: WishingStar
summary: "As I was saying, imagine my confusion when I arrived to find the two of you still circling each other like Zunidh's most innocent pair of nuns. Now, I know you're familiar with the mechanics, Cliopher, and he has a reputation—" Conju scowled in a way that Cliopher was learning to associate with reminders that their Fitzroy was, in fact, the Fitzroy Angursell and not someone who simply happened to share his name—"so that only leaves the question of why."

title: we will all be together again
author: Squeasel
summary: The Mdang siblings—as adults and as teens

title: Burning the Midnight Oil
author: songofsunset
summary: Kip stays up late, finishing his reports for Princess Indrogan.

title: :lock: Hawking
author: praycambrian
summary:
Long ago their hosts’ ancestors had discovered a vein of dreams running through the moors like tin or copper, and had chosen to build their halls upon it. All who slept there dreamed — everyone, every night — true dreams. Dreams with power.

Pali has a long gray midmorning of the soul.

title: :lock: A Study in Proximity: Behavioral Notes on the Imperial Court
author: DuhJustWriteAlready
summary:
A petitioner (original character) visits the Palace of Stars hoping for an audience with the Emperor. These are their observations from this trip.

Timeline: Post-petty-treasons, pre-Hote, some minor references to AtFotS canon. time is fluid but should be mostly Canon-compliant.

title: :lock: We are gonna be friends
author: DuhJustWriteAlready
summary: In his first winter in Astandalas the Golden, Kip Mdang makes an unexpected friend.
